<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="balanceSkin" width="1024" height="600" currentState="start" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:Base="Mix.Views.Base.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="start,over" >
	<w:Config id="1556346bd96"/>
	<e:Image left="-14" right="-14" top="-8" bottom="-10" source="bg2_png" scale9Grid="112,65,344,299"/>
	<Base:Button id="restartBtn" label="返回" includeIn="over" bottom="63" horizontalCenter="-141">
		<Base:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnBg1_png" source.down="btnBg1_png" source.disabled="btnBg1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</Base:skinName>
	</Base:Button>
	<e:Image source="fanIcon_png" includeIn="over" x="195" y="346"/>
	<e:Image source="huIcon_png" x="195" y="151" width="43" height="34" includeIn="over"/>
	<Base:Button id="startBtn" bottom="80" horizontalCenter="-124" includeIn="start">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
		<e:Image width="320" height="84" scale9Grid="34,21,81,3" source="btnBg1_png" source.down="btnBg1_png" source.disabled="btnBg1_png"/>
		<e:Image width="232" height="69" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="game_start_word_png" source.down="game_start_word_png" source.disabled="game_start_word_png"/>
		<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</Base:Button>
	<e:Image source="logo_png" horizontalCenter="-115" top="70" includeIn="start" x="850" y="406"/>
	<e:Label text="{allFanshu}" x="241" y="351" includeIn="over"/>
	<e:Label text="{allHupaishu}" x="246" y="153" includeIn="over"/>
	<e:Image source="logo_juese_png" right="6" bottom="6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="majiangBtnSkin" width="75" height="111" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="gai,li,dao" >
	<e:Image id="bgIcon" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="majiang_bg_1_png" source.gai="majiang_bg_3_png" source.dao="majiang_bg_2_png"/>
	<e:Image id="paiIcon" bottom="10" horizontalCenter="0" source="11_png" visible.gai="false" horizontalCenter.dao="0" bottom.dao="32" bottom.li="10"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="hupaiAreaSkin" height="160" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:Views="majiang.Views.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="majiangGroup" left="0" bottom="0">

		<Views:MajiangBtn label="按钮" x="390" y="38" skinName="majiangBtnSkin"/>

		<Views:MajiangBtn label="按钮" x="430" y="78" skinName="majiangBtnSkin"/>

		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="0"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="gangIcon_png" x="227" width="67" height="53" top="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="scoreBoardSkin" width="1024" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:Views="majiang.Views.*">
	<e:BitmapLabel id="timeBit" text="180" font="number_fnt" horizontalCenter="0" top="20"/>
	<e:Group id="paixingGroup" width="200" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="150" top="0" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout verticalAlign="bottom"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="hasSelect_0_png" x="942" y="14" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image source="hasSelect_1_png" x="795" y="14" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image source="hasSelect_2_png" x="869" y="14" visible="false"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="playSkin" width="1024" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:Views="majiang.Views.*">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg6_png" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="fanIcon_png" x="23" y="16"/>
	<Views:HupaiBtn id="hupaiBtn" width="150" height="119" icon="huIcon_png" anchorOffsetX="88" anchorOffsetY="78" x="950" y="531">
		<Views:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image id="iconDisplay" width="100%" height="100%"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</Views:skinName>
	</Views:HupaiBtn>
	<Views:HupaiArea id="hupaiArea" skinName="hupaiAreaSkin" bottom="20" left="34"/>
	<Views:XuanArea id="xuanArea" skinName="xuanAreaSkin" verticalCenter="-20" horizontalCenter="60"/>
	<e:Label text="{fanshu}" x="62" y="20" textColor="0xF67B15" bold="true" size="30" width="83" height="30" textAlign="left"/>
	<e:Image x="20" y="58" source="huIcon_png" width="41" height="33"/>
	<e:Label text="{hupaishu}" x="62" y="59" textColor="0xF67B15" bold="true" size="30" width="83" height="30" textAlign="left"/>
	<Views:ScoreBoard id="scoreBoard" skinName="scoreBoardSkin" top="0" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="itemBtnSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="100" height="120">
	<e:Image source="bg4_png" scale9Grid="15,8,90,8" width="100" height="120" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="coinIcon_png" x="0" y="87"/>
	<e:Image source="hasSelect_2_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="5"/>
	<e:Label text="300" x="34" y="90" size="22"/>
	<e:Label text="分数 + 10%" x="13" y="68" size="14"/>
	<e:Image source="success_png" right="0" bottom="-3"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="selectItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="450" height="500">
	<e:Image source="bg2_png" scale9Grid="115,72,340,272" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="refresh_png" x="255" y="21"/>
	<e:Group left="38" right="38" top="78" bottom="36">
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="43" y="82" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="53" y="92" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="63" y="102" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="73" y="112" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="83" y="122" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="93" y="132" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="103" y="142" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="113" y="152" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="按钮" x="123" y="162" skinName="itemBtnSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" rowAlign="justifyUsingGap" columnAlign="justifyUsingGap"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skillBtnSkin" width="380" height="140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="btn_png" scale9Grid="25,26,93,36" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="标签" x="292" y="91"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="userSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="380" height="90">
	<e:Image source="bg4_png" x="6" y="4" scale9Grid="15,8,90,8" width="249" height="37"/>
	<e:Image source="coinIcon_png" x="15" y="10"/>
	<e:Button x="3" y="48">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="addMoney1_png" source.down="addMoney1_png" source.disabled="addMoney1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label text="987654321" x="53" y="11" width="122" height="23" size="22"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="readySkin" width="1024" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="bg6_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Component skinName="selectItemSkin" horizontalCenter="230" top="10"/>
	<e:Group top="0" bottom="0" width="380" right="600">
		<e:Button label="能力" x="48" y="28" skinName="skillBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="角色" x="50" y="197" skinName="skillBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Button label="宠物" x="51" y="365" skinName="skillBtnSkin"/>
		<e:Component x="55" y="505" skinName="userSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" gap="20"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button bottom="10" horizontalCenter="240">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
            <e:Image width="320" height="84" scale9Grid="34,21,81,3" source="btnBg1_png" source.down="btnBg1_png" source.disabled="btnBg1_png"/>
			<e:Image width="232" height="69" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="game_start_word_png" source.down="game_start_word_png" source.disabled="game_start_word_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GuideSkin" width="1024" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="topRect" left="297" right="240" top="0" bottom="443" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0x222222"/>
	<e:Rect id="leftRect" left="0" right="752" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0x222222"/>
	<e:Rect id="rightRect" left="798" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0x222222"/>
	<e:Rect id="bottomRect" left="306" right="265" top="430" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0x222222"/>
	<e:Image source="majiang_bg_2_png" scale9Grid="9,18,57,50" width="465" height="70" left="281" bottom="197"/>
	<e:Label id="guideLabel" text="标签" bottom="234" bold="true" size="24" textColor="0x000000" width="444" left="291" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="guideImg" width="20" height="20" x="877" y="331"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="hupaiPaixingSkin" width="200" height="42" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
